page.title: 08Canvey - The Lake (3)
page.content: A three year community project started last year is the renovation and clearing out the lake in the centre of the {Winter Gardens}area. A local work force was recruited from the{Job Centre}with preference given to any long team unemployed person. When the work if finished it is hoped to provide a part time warden. The work,which is very hard involves the cutting out of a channel all round the edge of the lake as a deterrent to cats,dogs and foxs disturbing the wild life at nesting times especially the sitting of small reed islands for ducks to nest on, some of the reeds to provide a clearer view,clearing out the accummulation of tons of rubbish, landscaping, rotavating the banks and grass seeding.
